name: SolrUtils.digestXmlResponse
purpose: Parses an response XML string into a SolrObject

return.description: Returns the SolrObject representing the XML response.If the parse_mode parameter is set to SolrResponse::PARSE_SOLR_OBJ Solr documents will be parses as SolrObject instances.If it is set to SolrResponse::PARSE_SOLR_DOC, they will be parsed as SolrDocument instances.
